sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"忍受"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: stand, bear, endure, tolerate, suffer, abide, withstand
means: stand ： 口语用词，常可与bear换用，但前者侧重指经受得起，后者强调容忍，是普通用语。
endure ： 书面用词，指长时间忍受痛苦和不幸，着重体力或意志力的坚强不屈服。
tolerate ： 指以自我克制的态度，对待令人反感或厌恶的东西，含默认宽容意味。
suffer ： 通常指非自愿或被迫忍受各种痛苦、困难或不快，强调受到苦难。
abide ： 指忍受长期的痛苦或折磨，强调耐心和屈从。多用于否定句和疑问句中。
withstand ： 指因具有一定实力、权力或能力而能忍受某种情况。

sentence.Network_en: Miss Furniss could not abide sloppiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗尼斯小姐受不了马马虎虎的作风。

sentence.Network_en: I can't abide people with no sense of humour.
sentence.Network_cn: 我讨厌和没有幽默感的人打交道。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雯雯婴童坊 - 上古神话 - 网易博客 ... abeyance 缓办，中止 abide 遵守 ability 能力.
lee的博客 - lee - 网易博客 ... abduct v. 绑架，诱拐 abide v. 遵守；忍受 ability n. 能力.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... abhorrent adj． 可恨的，可厌的 abide v． 容忍，忍受 abject adj． 极可怜的，卑屈的.
aberrometer 象差计abide 坚持，遵守，依从ability 能力，本领，性能

list.abs: abiding英语的解释,abiding的英语翻... ... an abiding faith 不变的信念 abiding friendship 持久的友谊 abiding place 住宅, 家.
abide 遵守abiding place 住宅abiding 容忍
词语的固定搭配_百度文库 ... as yet 到目前(那时)为止 abide by 坚持;遵守 accustom to 使习惯.
vt.容忍abide by遵守，履行I can not abide him.我对他忍无可忍
we must abide by traffic regulations ., 我们必须遵守交通规则.

lj.lj_ly: abide by the rules; had to abide by the judge's decision.
lj.lj_ls: 遵守条律；服从法官的判决

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  ābīdan 'wait', from ā.- 'onwards' + bīdan (see bide)

entry.def: If you can't abide someone or something, you dislike them very much.

example.ex: I can't abide people who can't make up their minds...
example.tran: 我受不了优柔寡断的人。

sentences.sentence: "You can stay with me while you are in town"
"stay a bit longer--the day is still young"

means.word_mean: 2. put up with something or somebody unpleasant;

sentences.sentence: "The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks"
"She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage"

auth_sentence.content: I hope that they will abide by that promise.
auth_sentence.res_content: I hope that they will abide by that promise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I hope that they will abide by that promise.

auth_sentence.content: Egypt will abide by the law and implement it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Egypt will abide by the law and implement it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Egypt will abide by the law and implement it.

auth_sentence.content: That's the part I couldn't abide doing.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's the part I couldn't abide doing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's the part I couldn't abide doing.

sentences.en: How can you abide such a person?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能屈从于这样的人?
她不能忍受他的粗鲁行为。

sentences.en: They abide in a remote village.
sentences.cn: 他们住在一个偏远的村子里。

sentences.en: The child abode with his grandparents for two years.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子和祖父母一起居住了两年。

jushi.english: We shall abide till the battle is won.
jushi.chinese: 我们一直等待到这场战争获得胜利。

jushi.english: They abide here for some time.
jushi.chinese: 他们在这里住了些时候。

jushi.english: She was forced to abide here.
